title: Google's Pixel phone plans for 2023 and beyond have leaked
description: A roadmap for Google's Pixel plans all the way up to 2025 has emerged, and there are some interesting plans.

title: Seven wishes for iOS 17 that I want to see for my iPhone
description: As we look into 2023, there's a bunch of features that would benefit a lot of iOS users for the next update.

title: Santa Tracker live: how to follow Santa with Norad or Google
description: Want the best Santa Tracker and to play some fun games through Norad or Google? We're live-blogging it for you
